assets.changelog:
## 更新内容
* **优化**: 隐藏“导入导出设置”按钮 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/707  
* **修复**: 第三方登录启动失败问题 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/711  
* **引导优化**: 当用户试图更改第三方验证档案的披风时，将其引导至皮肤站内修改 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/712  
* **修复**: LabyMod 相关问题修复 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/714  
* **修复**: 部分字段未使用 McLoginType 枚举值 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/722  
* **修复**: 排序比较时间时未处理时间相同的情况 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/725  
* **修复**: SMTC 相关问题修复 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/718  
* **体验优化**: 提升调试体验 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/717  
* **代码同步**: Sync Code by @shimoranla in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/731  
* **代码同步**: Sync Code by @shimoranla in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/732  
* **修复**: CI 问题修复 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/734  
* **主题系统**: 基于 HSL 颜色转换的全新主题系统 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/720  
* **功能新增**: 添加新的更新源 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/729  
* **修复**: 可能在获取更新信息前检查启动器最新版本的问题 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/735  
* **修复**: 深色主题相关问题修复 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/736  
* **功能新增**: 为服务器预览功能添加随机字符串 by @MinecraftYJQ in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/761  
* **体验优化**: 服务器延迟测试与 UI 改进 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/760  
* **修复**: 服务器解析可能引发的异常问题 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/763  
* **数据库优化**: 使用 SQLite 替换模组文本数据库 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/768  
* **修复**: #365 问题修复 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/784  
* **修复**: 1.16.5 离线多人游戏问题 by @Pigeon0v0 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/787  
* **修复**: 官方版加载帮助库时因未隔离导致的错误 by @baiyuexiao496 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/788  
* **重构**: C# VB.NET 混合开发 & Java 选择页面重构 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/740  
* **功能新增**: 使用系统默认图片查看器打开截图 by @xrlzu in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/789  
* **修复**: 玩家名修改功能失效问题 by @baiyuexiao496 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/794  
* **维护**: 更新翻译接口地址 by @baiyuexiao496 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/796  

## 新贡献者
* @MinecraftYJQ 首次贡献于 https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/761  
* @baiyuexiao496 首次贡献于 https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/788  

**完整更新日志**: https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/compare/2.11.1...2.11.2

---

[如果你有 Mirror 酱 CDK 可以直接使用此高速下载源](https://mirrorchyan.com/zh/projects?rid=PCL2-CE&source=gh-release)
你也可以直接在下方的 Assets 中下载

* **修复**: 服务器解析可能引发的异常问题 by @ruattd in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/763  
* **数据库优化**: 使用 SQLite 替换模组文本数据库 by @tangge233 in https://github.com/PCL-Community/PCL2-CE/pull/768
